item.title: Dorothy Bishop
item.description:
New blogpost: nonsensical papers as canaries in the coalmine - and more bad news for MDPI.
https://deevybee.blogspot.com/2025/01/tomatoes-roaming-fields-and-canaries-in.html

item.title: Cory Doctorow
item.description: HOPE is a homebrew, homely, cheap, cheerful and delightfully anarchic hacker con with deep history and great people. Speaking of weird ancient history, my pal Ada Palmer - sf writer, librettist, singer, and Renaissance historian - blew my mind this week with her article on the tower-cities of medieval proto-Italy during the Guelph-Ghibelline wars (1125-1392):https://www.exurbe.com/the-lost-towers-of-the-guelph-ghibelline-wars/12/

item.title: Greg Wilson
item.description: We're sleepwalking: https://www.theguardian.com/tv-and-radio/2025/jan/19/the-westminster-whistleblower-how-my-friend-sergei-tried-to-expose-the-kremlin-plot-against-britain

item.title: Opinion | The Guardian US
item.description: Trump and Musk have launched a new class war. In the UK, we must prepare to defend ourselves | George Monbiot https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2025/jan/19/donald-trump-elon-musk-class-war-uk-us-oligarchies-democracy #USincomeinequality #VivekRamaswamy #DonaldTrump #Classissues #USpolitics #Inequality #Worldnews #ElonMusk #USnews

item.title: Nicolas Fressengeas
item.description: "L'une des informations les plus choquantes que jai obtenues de Facebook et qui, selon moi, est essentielle à cette divulgation, est que les partis politiques ont eté cités, dans les propres recherches de Facebook, disant : "Nous savons que vous avez changé la façon dont vous sélectionnez le contenu qui va dans le fil d actualité. Et maintenant, si nous ne publions pas de contenu négatif, haineux, polarisant ou qui divise, cest silence radio. Nous n'obtenons rien. Et nous n'aimons pas ça. Nous savons que nos électeurs n'aiment pas ça, mais, si nous ne publions pas ce type de messages, ils ne sont pas diffusés. Avant, nous en faisions très peu, mais maintenant nous devons en faire beaucoup, parce que cest notre travail, et si nous n'obtenons pas de trafic et dengagement, nous perdrons nos emplois."" — David Chavalarias: Toxic Data, pp. 98-98Citation de Frances Haugen, une ancienne envoyée de Facebook, en 2021, lors d'une interview pour CBS News.

item.title: BrianKrebs
item.description: I love that I've been on Mastodon more than 2 years now as my one and only social media platform (apart from LinkedIn, sorta), and I can say with some confidence that most of the accounts I'm interacting with are not bots, but instead are real live human beings with fascinating lives and interests. Thanks again everyone, and may we continue to enjoy this remarkable achievement for a long time to come.

item.title: Dan Goodman
item.description: Wow! The much touted FrontierMath dataset was secretly funded by OpenAI who had privileged access to it.https://techcrunch.com/2025/01/19/ai-benchmarking-organization-criticized-for-waiting-to-disclose-funding-from-openai/

item.title: Dan Neidle
item.description: Douglas Barrowman sold a possibly criminal, tax avoidance scheme using an Isle of Man company called Principal Contracts Ltd. The Isle of Man authorities say it failed to file accounts, paid unlawful dividends, & failed to pay £5m of Isle of Man VAT. Guess what happened next?

item.title: Dan Neidle
item.description: HMRC has no problem chasing Barrowman's clients/victims for tax, but seems to have made no effort to pursue Barrowman and his team. We've published extensive evidence that we believe justifies a criminal investigation - but there's no sign of any action.

item.title: Dan Neidle
item.description: And the Isle of Man authorities are also asleep at the wheel. What's the point of the Isle of Man having company law if PCL could disregard it, fail to ever file accounts, and suffer no consequences?

item.title: Dan Neidle
item.description: There aren't many wealthy people you can accuse of fraud without receiving a libel writ. Draw your own conclusions.

item.title: Dan Neidle
item.description: Barrowman isn't alone. There's an entire industry of selling duff tax avoidance scheme to "normal" people, who don't have the background to see that the schemes are hopeless.And people like Barrowman keep doing it, because they keep getting away with it.

item.title: Earl K. Miller
item.description:
Even at the highest levels of cortex, there is some independence between the cerebral hemispheres, requiring their coordination.
Redundant, weakly connected prefrontal hemispheres balance precision and capacity in spatial working memory
https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2025.01.15.633176v1.abstract
#neuroscience

item.title: Earl K. Miller
item.description:
More evidence for alpha/beta oscillations in top-down feedback signaling.
Backward alpha oscillations shape perceptual bias under probabilistic cues
https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2025.01.14.632925v1.abstract
#neuroscience

item.title: Ada Palmer
item.description: Let’s talk about resistance after a conqueror takes power. Specifically let’s talk about this bendy yellow building, and what it shows us about the moment the Florentine Republic finally fell to its kleptocratic/proto-capitalist banking-fortune Medici conquerors 1/?

item.title: Sean O'Brien
item.description: We've served up nearly 7,000 #TikToks via our privacy-respecting StickTock.com which loads zero code from #TikTok for users, is ad-free, and requires no login at all. And now users are reporting the use of our tool all over the web!
